item.title: Mac中Docker访问宿主机服务
item.description: Mac的docker并没有docker0这个桥接的网卡，所以无法通过容器的网关IP访问宿主机的服务，这个好坑。。。 查询了官方文档给的解释如下： There is no docker0 bridge on macOS Because of the way networking is implemented in Docker Desktop for Mac, you cannot see a docker0 interface on the host. This interface is actually within the virtual machine. 容器与宿主机的网络连接是通过Docker Desktop实现的，要访问只能通过域名host.docker.internal访问，官方说明如下： I WANT TO CONNECT FROM A CONTAINER TO A SERVICE ON THE HOST The host has a changing IP address (or none if you have no network access).
